layout_strategies.container: container mx-auto px-4 md:px-6 lg:px-8 max-w-7xl

bento_grid.wrapper: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 md:gap-8

header.style: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-white/10 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-white/60
header.elements: Logo (Left), Nav Links (Center - Manrope font), Actions (Right - Icons + Cart)

hero.typography: Left aligned, massive H1, clear CTA

product_card.style: group relative flex flex-col overflow-hidden bg-white hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 ease-out border border-transparent hover:border-slate-100 rounded-none

buttons.primary: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-sm bg-[#D50032] px-8 py-3 text-sm font-medium text-white shadow transition-colors hover:bg-[#B9002D] focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-slate-950
buttons.outline: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-sm border border-slate-200 bg-transparent px-8 py-3 text-sm font-medium shadow-sm transition-colors hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900

universal_guidelines: Use Manrope for all Headings (H1-H4) and Inter for Body text.
Do NOT use gradients for text or buttons. Stick to solid, high-contrast colors.
Spacing is luxury. Use py-24 for major sections.
Borders should be subtle: border-slate-100 or border-slate-200.
Use data-testid attributes for all interactive elements.
Images must have alt tags for accessibility.
Hover states must be explicit (e.g., text color change, subtle lift).
Do not use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Keep it sharp or minimal rounded-sm (2px-4px) for that 'German Engineering' precision.
